turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “a local bank branch and calling a customer service to request to help with everyday banking service and you are the you are the shopper and I'm the customer so let's start the communication.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, let's get started! Hello! This is your local bank branch. How can I assist you today with your banking needs?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, I'd like to open a new CV account in your bank.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! I'd be happy to help you with that. Could you please let me know if you have any specific requirements or if there's a particular type of savings account you're interested in?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No yet, but you can find the table that I have finished on the website.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it! That makes it easy. I'll just confirm a few details with you. Could you please provide me with your ID and any initial deposit amount you'd like to make?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, of course, and you can check it in 100.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, I’ll take a look at that for you right away. Once I confirm everything, we’ll be all set to open your new savings account!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, can I set up online banking at the same time?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we can get that set up for you as well! I'll include that in the process. Just a moment, and we'll have everything ready for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And could I open the saving account and the everyday account at the same time?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, you can definitely do that! I'll set up both the savings account and the everyday account for you at the same time. Let me just take care of that for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can your account add into the Apple Pay?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, I can help with that as well! Once we have everything set up, I'll guide you through adding your new accounts to Apple Pay. Just a moment, and we'll get it all done!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So when will I receive your physical card?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You should receive your physical card within about 5 to 7 business days. In the meantime, you'll be able to use the accounts digitally. If you need anything else, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So if I want to use the card emergency, could I use the online bank?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! You can start using the online banking right away, and that will give you access to all your accounts digitally, including making payments and transfers. If you need any help with that, I’m here for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “If I want to transfer a large amount of my money, how do you verify the identity for me?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: We do have a security process in place for larger transfers. Typically, we’ll verify your identity through a secure code sent to your phone or email, and sometimes we might need a quick verification call. I can guide you through that whenever you're ready!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So could you assure that you will make nothing wrong when I transfer a huge amount of money?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I’ll make sure everything is handled securely and smoothly for you. You can count on me to guide you through the process, and if you have any concerns, I’m here to help.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “OK, so at the same time, can I get, um, can I...”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, I’m here whenever you need

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, I can open a joint account with my partner.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, you can definitely open a joint account with your partner. I'll just need a few details from both of you, and we can get that set up at the same time. Let me know when you're ready!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, we are ready. So what details do you need?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great! I'll just need some basic information from both of you, like your full names, addresses, and identification details. We can also discuss any specific preferences for the account. Let’s get started!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, that's all, and I won't give you the details.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect! I'll be ready to take those details from you whenever you're set. Just let me know, and we'll get everything all squared away!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “You will receive the physical card just a few days later and in our home, right?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that’s perfect! You can expect to receive your physical card in just a few days at home. If you have any other questions or need help with anything else, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “ご視聴ありがとうございました。”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'm glad I could help. If you need anything else in the future, just reach out. Have a wonderful day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Have a good day. Bye.”
